member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.SystemController.Reset
member.summary: Deletes and creates the [futuristic.services] system database. ** USE WITH CAUTION **

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.SystemLookupItemsController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all items associated to the specified group from the [TangledServices.ServicePortal] database 'LookupItems' container.
member.param: The name of group to retrieve.
member.returns: 401 ~ Not authorized or invalid JWT token.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.SystemTenantController.Tenant(System.String)
member.summary: Sets up a tenant in the [futuristic.services] database Tenant container. Tenant details come from the 'tenants.json' config file with matching moniker.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.SystemUserController.Reset(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes and creates the [futuristic.services] system database. ** USE WITH CAUTION **
Manages all endpoints for the registration process.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantRegistrationController.MetaData
member.summary: Retrieves all data required to populate controls on the Tenant registration form (ie. states, countries, address types, etc).

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantRegistrationController.PromotionCode(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the provided code against existing subscriptions in the [TangledServices.ServicePortal] database Subscriptions container. Success ~ Returns associated subscription if subscription is valid. Failure ~ No subscription found associated to promotion code.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantRegistrationController.Moniker(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the provided moniker is available for use.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantRegistrationController.Tenant(TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Models.RegistrationModel)
member.summary: Creates a new tenant within the [TangledServices.ServicePortal] database Tenant container.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantRegistrationController.Tenant(System.String)
member.summary: Registers a tenant with the matching moniker from the tenants.json file.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TenantSetupController.Setup(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a [TangledServices.{moniker}.ServicePortal] database. Inside the database, creates a 'LookupItems', 'Subscriptions' and 'Users' containers. Populates each container with appropriate items.
member.param: ID unique to each Tenant used in all API requests.

member.name: T:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TokenController
member.summary: Performs methods for the Service Desk setup process.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TokenController.#ctor(TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Managers.ISystemTenantManager)
member.summary: Service Desk constructor.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TokenController.Validate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a setup token (GUID) is authentic and associated to the proper tenant.
member.param: Unique ID assigned to each tenant used making API requests.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.TokenController.New(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates the moniker and pocEmailAddress is associated to the proper tenant. If valid, generates a new setup token. Token is emailed to the provided PoC email address. Otherwise, HTTP-BadRequest.

member.name: M:TangledServices.ServicePortal.API.Controllers.UserController.authenticate(System.String)
member.summary: Authenicates a username/password. If successful, returns a JWT token. Otherwise, login failed.
member.param: Unique tenant ID used in URL routing.
